item.title: Feds reimburse Florida $608 million for 'Alligator Alcatraz' costs
item.description: Federal officials have reimbursed Florida $608 million for an immigration detention center in the Everglades

item.title: Supreme Court to consider overturning Hawaii law regulating where guns can be carried
item.description: The Supreme Court says it will consider overturning a Hawaii law that imposes strict regulations on where people can carry guns

item.title: New Hampshire teen who killed sister-in-law and nephews could get 97 years in prison
item.description: Prosecutors argue a New Hampshire man deserves at least 97 years in prison for killing his sister-in-law and two nephews
